alert.note: Alert for Bolivar Peninsula; Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Galveston; Galveston Island (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 11:44PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Galveston and eastern Brazoria Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1144 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Schlitterbahn, or near Galveston Pier 21, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Galveston Island West End, Galveston Causeway, Hitchcock, Galveston Pier 21, Jamaica Beach, Tiki Island, Pelican Island, Galveston State Park, Schlitterbahn, Scholes Field, The Strand, Offatts Bayou, Galveston Pleasure Pier, Galveston Island East End, Moody Gardens and Port Bolivar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bolivar Peninsula; Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Galveston; Galveston Island
